name: Box-Button
description:
Box-Button Play out of the box!

The boxes want to press the button, it is a win-win situation when all buttons are pressed, so the boxes have to work together.

Use your mouse to move the boxes. Use the boxes to press all buttons simultaniously.

Accesibility: 
- No text in-game, except for the title.
- Good colors for color-blind people.
- No fast reactions needed, only problem solving.

All art, sounds, programming and other assets are made by myself.

Entry for the global startupcities gamejam
